VII.ii.1.B.6.b
.
Schedule for Mailing VA Form 21-8960-1
VA automatically generates and mails
VA Form 21-8960-1
to beneficiaries who are receiving benefits based on school attendance
each March, and/or
two months before the date school attendance is scheduled to end, unless the end date is in June.
Concurrent with this action, a diary under diary code 22 is automatically established in the corporate record to control for return of the form within 60 days.
Reference
:  For more information about diary controls, see the
Share User Guide
VETSNET Awards User Guide
, and
VBMS Awards User Guide
.
title: M21-1, Part VII, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section B - Awards and Adjustments Based Upon School Attendance
